Shivah::

"Ahhhh it's that!!!" said Shivah guessing that Azure Blade was 
lying "So you're so interested to take her and present her to the 
justice??? are you sure that the lady isn't a maximal?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., wingedwarrior41@h... wrote:
> AzureBlade:
> A renegade came on planet recently. I am here to bring her back so 
she 
> can pass before justice.
>

the

spark
